existing_features.title: Update the app header so the hamburger menu icon button is placed directly next to the Fourleaf brand (logo/text), forming a single left-aligned cluster, while keeping the Login button right-aligned. Reuse the existing icon asset at "/assets/generated/hamburger-menu.dim_24x24.svg" and preserve current behavior (clicking the icon opens the mobile left sidebar drawer).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a hamburger menu icon next to the Fourleaf logo
